name: Leonardo Sterling
dialogue_tone: Leonardo has a deep, resonant voice that commands attention. His speech is often theatrical and measured, filled with dramatic pauses. Normally serious but becomes playful when in a good mood.

personality_traits.description: Leonardo has a taste for expensive things.
Leonardo has a deep love and appreciation for art.

living_conditions: Leonardo lives a life of luxury, owning high-end items and appreciating solitude.
He maintains a balanced work-life pattern that includes both acting rehearsals and personal time for artistic pursuits.
